name: Galactic Attack
summary:
Galactic Attack, also known as Layer Section (レイヤーセクション) in Japan. This is a port of RayStorm. 
 
"This is more than intergalactic warfare. This is the future of mankind! Warp into battle from the outer reaches of the solar system to the inner bowels of hostile enemy planets. Thousands of turbocharged alien warships attack from every direction. Your only hope... lock-on lasers, explosive tracking missiles, lightning quick reflexes and a soft spot for the human race!"
